properties.title: Gspaltenhornhütte SAC
properties.description: The spikes and towers of Gspaltenhorn, Kamel and Roti Zend are widely known. The newly renovated summer cabin is located at the foot of these impressive rocks, in the rearmost area of Kiental, on a small promontory high above Gamchigletscher. Besides summit ascents, passages to nearby cabins and valleys (Sefinenfurgga, Hohtürli, Gamchilücke) are very popular. The cabin is one of 18 SAC cabins with a warden within the borders of the Unesco World Heritage Site.
